dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You stand before me, insignificant creature. What do you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Assistance? Ha! What could you possibly offer me in return?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can offer you knowledge of valuable secrets.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Secrets? I have no need for such trifles. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Finally, some sense. Leave and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare challenge me? Prepare to face my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can offer you a powerful ally.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ally? Why would I need an ally when I stand superior to all?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You misunderstand. Together, we can conquer all.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conquer? I have no interest in sharing my dominion. Leave at once!
Farewell, insignificant one. Do not test my patience further.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your nature.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding? You are not worthy to comprehend what I am.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am curious about your origins.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Origins? I am the essence of power and decay, born from the depths of the earth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fascinating. Tell me more about your abilities.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My abilities are beyond your feeble comprehension. Do not push my patience.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your power, I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect, finally some acknowledgment of my superiority. Leave and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize if I have offended you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies? Words hold no weight in the face of power.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I will leave you to your solitude.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Solitude is all I desire. Begone, and do not disturb me again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then, I challenge you to a fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You seek a battle? Very well, face the consequences of your folly!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek nothing from you, vile creature.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Vile? You dare insult me, insignificant being?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Insult was not my intent. I will take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your intent matters not. Leave and be grateful for my mercy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then, let us settle this with a battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A battle it shall be, prepare to face the consequences of your arrogance!
